text: Glenicia James (born 16 June 1974) is a former Saint Lucian cricketer who represented the West Indies. A right-handed top order batter, Watts played in five women's One Day International matches. She played all her matches against Sri Lanka during their March 2003 tour. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Saint Lucian women cricketers Category:West Indian women cricketers Category:West Indies women One Day International cricketers
title: Glenicia James
